author: Arturo Pozuelo Calvet
title: Global sustainable transport
description: The continuous advance of society causes every day more climate problems, the planet dies and Cardano can help save it 😀

assessments.note: incoherent. not well defined. solution does not address the problem.

The proposal would allow users of the dApp to pay fares for use of public transit systems across borders. The proposal fails to identify how transit operators will be brought onboard, allowing the use of the dApp on their transit assets.

The influence of society's impact on the climate is a complex issue and there is no unanimity about the significant severity of this even among experts on the subject, so I think the problem statement could be modified.

In general the proposal is just a draft. There is no mention of a dapp in the proposal, so there is no way to understand how the proposal will address the challenge.

Love the concept - but there isn't much more to it at the present stage though. Also - would love have read about tying it all down to the goals of the community. We know that proof of stake is great element towards sustainability - bringing that into the proposal and showing it off would have been great addition to it. Show the community how it will enhance its use case and also image. Next time.
The proposal is a great idea however no milestones or plan exists to support implementation and adoption of the dApp.
The proposal doesn't describe the need to use a blockchain or a dapp. There is no information about the proposer's experience or skills.

Unfortunately, there isn't enough information that would help us determine any of these. Relevant experience of the proposer (such as links to professional profiles) or budget semantics and breakdown beyond one grand figure. We just don't k know where and how money would be spent. Adding these elements next time would be very desirable. Including understanding who would actually develop this - a team? One person? Unsure from presentation.

The proposal doesn't appear to have evaluated the feasibility of the dApp. No plan to gain adoption by the transit operators in various cities around the world exists. No success metrics were identified by the proposal.
There is not enough information to assess feasibility. There is no rationale that explains how the proposal will address the challenge.

There is no detail at the moment that would help anchor this idea into executable proposal with roadmap or milestones. Adding success metrics to determine how to track this more effectively in the future - it'd be great improvement. Also - would love to learn about how authors think about challenges and risks associated with this concept. So - great idea - needs work - I would suggest to add these new elements and re-submit at later stage.

solution: A globally unified sustainable transport system thanks to a payment system with a common token which allows you to always use it
experience: The user can earn rewards in tokens for using public transport and also hold the tokens in their own wallet.
